targets.query:
from(bucket: "API_Response")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Percentage_Validation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["API"] == "API1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Functional_Validation_passed")

from(bucket: "API_Response")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Percentage_Validation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["API"] == "API1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Non_Functional_Validation_passed")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["API"] == "API1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Non_Functional_Host_Validation_passed")
